articles.title: Recent homes sales in Greater Boston (Feb. 18)
articles.description:
ABINGTON 840 Hancock St. One-family Colonial, built in 1984, 1,872 square feet, 7 rooms, 4 bedrooms, 3 baths, on 100,169-square-foot lot. $705,000 193 Linwood St. One-family ranch, built in 1955, 1,178 square feet, 5 rooms, 2 bedrooms, 2 baths, on 68,370-square-foot lot. $610,000 29 West St. One-family conventional, built in 1890, 1,360 square feet, 7 […]

The post Recent homes sales in Greater Boston (Feb. 18) appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Abington home sales included a Colonial at 840 Hancock St. for $705,000.
A ranch at 193 Linwood St. sold for $610,000, impacting local housing market dynamics.
Increased home prices may affect affordability for Boston residents seeking new properties.
